text: A creditor of a beneficial owner or trustee shall not obtain possession of, or otherwise exercise legal or equitable remedies with respect to, the property of a statutory trust or any series thereof.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 305 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1203.05

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: No creditor rights in trust property.
